text: Katherine Victoria "Katie" Tunstall, also known as KT Tunstall (born 23 June 1975), is a Scottish singer and songwriter. She was born in St Andrews, Fife. Her father is Irish; her mother is half-Chinese, half-Scottish. She was adopted when she was 18 days old. She has had many hit songs, including, "Black Horse and the Cherry Tree"'. ==References== == Other websites == * Category:1975 births Category:Living people Category:British adoptees Category:Scottish singer-songwriters
title: KT Tunstall
